verse.gurmukhi: 6 : bymuK ig`dV dwK hY Awpxw doS dUey nUM
verse.unicode: ੬ : ਬੇਮੁਖ ਗਿੱਦੜ ਦਾਖ ਹੈ ਆਪਣਾ ਦੋਸ਼ ਦੂਏ ਨੂੰ

en.bdb: The apostate puts blame on others   ,

transliteration.english: 6 : bemukh gi'dhaR dhaakh hai aapanaa dhosh dhooe noo(n)
transliteration.hindi: ६ : बेमुख गिद्दड़ दाख है आपणा दोश दूए नूँ
transliteration.en: 6 : bemukh gi'dhaR dhaakh hai aapanaa dhosh dhooe noo(n)
transliteration.hi: ६ : बेमुख गिद्दड़ दाख है आपणा दोश दूए नूँ
transliteration.ipa: 6 : bemʊkʰ Gɪd̪əɽ d̪ɑkʰ hæ əɑpəɳɑ d̪ɔʃ d̪uee nuŋ
transliteration.ur: ۶ : بےمکھ گّدڑ داکھ هَے آپݨا دوش دُواے نُوں

verse.gurmukhi: igdV dwK nw ApVY AwKY QUh kauVI[
verse.unicode: ਗਿਦੜ ਦਾਖ ਨਾ ਅਪੜੈ ਆਖੈ ਥੂਹ ਕਉੜੀ।

en.bdb: The jackal cannot reach the grapes and says disdainfully that grapes are sour.

transliteration.english: gidhaR dhaakh naa apaRai aakhai thooh kauRee|
transliteration.hindi: गिदड़ दाख ना अपड़ै आखै थूह कउड़ी।
transliteration.en: gidhaR dhaakh naa apaRai aakhai thooh kauRee|
transliteration.hi: गिदड़ दाख ना अपड़ै आखै थूह कउड़ी।
transliteration.ipa: Gɪd̪əɽ d̪ɑkʰ nɑ əpəɽæ əɑkʰæ t̪ʰuh koʊɽi.
transliteration.ur: گِدڑ داکھ نا اپڑَے آکھَے تھُوه کاڑیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: ncxu nic nw jwxeI AwKY Buie sauVI[
verse.unicode: ਨਚਣੁ ਨਚਿ ਨਾ ਜਾਣਈ ਆਖੈ ਭੁਇ ਸਉੜੀ।

en.bdb: The dancer knows no dance but says that the place is narrow.

transliteration.english: nachan nach naa jaaniee aakhai bhui sauRee|
transliteration.hindi: नचणु नचि ना जाणई आखै भुइ सउड़ी।
transliteration.en: nachan nach naa jaaniee aakhai bhui sauRee|
transliteration.hi: नचणु नचि ना जाणई आखै भुइ सउड़ी।
transliteration.ipa: nət͡ʃəɳ nət͡ʃ nɑ d͡ʒɑɳei əɑkʰæ ɓʊeɪ soʊɽi.
transliteration.ur: نچݨ نچ نا جاݨای آکھَے بھُا ساڑیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: bolY AgY gwvIAY BYrau so gauVI[
verse.unicode: ਬੋਲੈ ਅਗੈ ਗਾਵੀਐ ਭੈਰਉ ਸੋ ਗਉੜੀ।

en.bdb: Before a deaf person singing in measure Bhairav or Gaul is the same.

transliteration.english: bolai agai gaaveeaai bhairau so gauRee|
transliteration.hindi: बोलै अगै गावीऐ भैरउ सो गउड़ी।
transliteration.en: bolai agai gaaveeaai bhairau so gauRee|
transliteration.hi: बोलै अगै गावीऐ भैरउ सो गउड़ी।
transliteration.ipa: bɔlæ əGæ Gɑʋiæ ɓæro sɔ Goʊɽi.
transliteration.ur: بولَے اگَے گاویِاَے بھَےرا سو گاڑیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: hMsW nwil ttIhrI ikau phucY dauVI[
verse.unicode: ਹੰਸਾਂ ਨਾਲਿ ਟਟੀਹਰੀ ਕਿਉ ਪਹੁਚੈ ਦਉੜੀ।

en.bdb: How a plover can fly equal to a swan.

transliteration.english: ha(n)saa(n) naal TaTeeharee kiau pahuchai dhauRee|
transliteration.hindi: हंसाँ नालि टटीहरी किउ पहुचै दउड़ी।
transliteration.en: ha(n)saa(n) naal TaTeeharee kiau pahuchai dhauRee|
transliteration.hi: हंसाँ नालि टटीहरी किउ पहुचै दउड़ी।
transliteration.ipa: həŋsɑⁿ nɑl ʈəʈihəri kɪo pəhʊt͡ʃæ d̪oʊɽi.
transliteration.ur: هںساں نال ٹٹیِهریِ کا پهُچَے داڑیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: swvix vx hrIAwvly Aku jMmY AauVI[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਵਣਿ ਵਣ ਹਰੀਆਵਲੇ ਅਕੁ ਜੰਮੈ ਅਉੜੀ।

en.bdb: The whole of the forest goes green in rainy season (sit-van) but akk, the wild plant of sandy region (calotropis procera) grows in the period of drought.

transliteration.english: saavan van hareeaavale ak ja(n)mai aauRee|
transliteration.hindi: सावणि वण हरीआवले अकु जंमै अउड़ी।
transliteration.en: saavan van hareeaavale ak ja(n)mai aauRee|
transliteration.hi: सावणि वण हरीआवले अकु जंमै अउड़ी।
transliteration.ipa: sɑʋəɳ ʋəɳ həriəɑʋəle ək d͡ʒəŋmæ əoʊɽi.
transliteration.ur: ساوݨ وݨ هریِآولے اک جںمَے ااڑیِ۔

verse.gurmukhi: bymuK suKu nw dyKeI ijau CutiV CauVI ]6]
verse.unicode: ਬੇਮੁਖ ਸੁਖੁ ਨਾ ਦੇਖਈ ਜਿਉ ਛੁਟੜਿ ਛਉੜੀ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: The apostate cannot have happiness like an abandoned woman.

transliteration.english: bemukh sukh naa dhekhiee jiau chhuTaR chhauRee ||6||
transliteration.hindi: बेमुख सुखु ना देखई जिउ छुटड़ि छउड़ी ॥६॥
transliteration.en: bemukh sukh naa dhekhiee jiau chhuTaR chhauRee ||6||
transliteration.hi: बेमुख सुखु ना देखई जिउ छुटड़ि छउड़ी ॥६॥
transliteration.ipa: bemʊkʰ sʊkʰ nɑ d̪ekʰei d͡ʒɪo ɕʊʈəɽ ɕoʊɽi.6.
transliteration.ur: بےمکھ سُکھ نا دےکھای جا چھُٹڑ چھاڑیِ ۔۔۶۔۔
